body.p:
Henry has come in to see you for a routine medication review. You notice that he was seen by one of your colleagues last year for problems with back pain. He was prescribed oral analgesia, as well as diazepam (5 mg three times daily, when required).
What is the evidence for the use of benzodiazepines in pain management?

Henry has been collecting scripts for diazepam ever since the episode of back pain. He also has a regular prescription for co-codamol and zopiclone. He states that the drugs help to manage his pain and allow him to sleep.
Outline the risks posed by long-term use of these medications
Consider the societal implications. How might these drugs be abused? What is their ‘street value’?
How would you tackle this situation? Discuss an appropriate benzodiazepine-reducing regimen and whom you might involve to support Henry through this.
